source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot from a low-angle perspective at the bottom of a staircase. The walls and ceiling are uniformly covered in small, white tiles, flanked by simple black handrails. The camera moves steadily up the stairs toward an intensely bright, white light at the top, which creates a stark and minimalist atmosphere.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot from a low-angle perspective at the bottom of a staircase. The walls and ceiling are uniformly covered in small, white tiles, flanked by simple black handrails. The camera moves steadily up the stairs toward an intensely bright, white light at the top, which creates a stark and minimalist atmosphere.

generated_critique: The caption includes descriptions of the static environment ("walls and ceiling are uniformly covered in small, white tiles, flanked by simple black handrails") and subjective interpretations ("which creates a stark and minimalist atmosphere"), both of which should be removed. The description should focus only on the camera's movement. The caption should be revised to describe the motion from a first-person perspective.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: From the bottom of a staircase, I ascend steadily toward a bright, white light at the top.
